titles: The freeness of Gods grace in the forgiveness of sins by Jesus Christ, vindicated. Against the doctrine of Mr. Fergusson, in his sermon preached at the morning lecture, the fifth of August 1668. in a letter to a friend. By H. W. a lover of the truth that is according to Godliness.
author: H. W.
publisher: printed for J. J. and are to be sold at William Crooks, at three Bibles near Temple Bar, and at Peter Parker's in Billeter Lane,
notes: "Mr. Fergusson" = Robert Ferguson, who replied to this tract in an appendix to: Justification onely upon a satisfaction. The title of the sermon which provoked the controversy has not been traced.
Reproduction of the original in the Exeter College Library, Oxford University.
